name: TC_11_46_02 | Verify that user can change the date format to DD / MM / YYYY
description: Objective: To verify that a user can update the date format in their profile settings and the updated date format is applied when signing a document. The date format YYYY / DD / MM was not checked and included to test data because of the existed bug

steps.name: New User Setup: Free User Sign up
Free user sign up API call
New User Setup: Free User Email Confirmation via Database
New User Setup: Free User Login
New User Setup: Upgrade Free User to Business
Click the Settings on the Side Menu
Click on the Billing option in the side menu
Click "No,thanks" button on the One Time Special Offer Modal
A toast message with the text "Plan has been successfully changed." is visible and hidden then
Click the Settings on the Side Menu
Click "Date Format" dropdown in the Preferences section
Verify that a toast message with the text "Profile information updated." popped up
